verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> [gifts,] brethren, <S%G80><s%> I do not want <S%G2309><s%> you to be unaware. <S%G50><s%>

You know <S%G3609><s%> that when <S%G3753><s%> you were pagans, <S%G1484><s%> [you were] led <S%G520><s%> astray <S%G520><s%> to the dumb <S%G880><s%> idols, <S%G1497><s%> however <S%G5613><s%> <S%G302><s%> you were led. <S%G71><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> I make <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to you, that no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is accursed <S%G331><s%>"; and no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> "Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is Lord, <S%G2962><s%>" except <S%G1508><s%> by the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> there are varieties <S%G1243><s%> of gifts, <S%G5486><s%> but the same <S%G846><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
And there are varieties <S%G1243><s%> of ministries, <S%G1248><s%> and the same <S%G846><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And there are varieties <S%G1243><s%> of effects, <S%G1755><s%> but the same <S%G846><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> who works <S%G1754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> [persons.]
But to each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> the manifestation <S%G5321><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> for the common <S%G4851><s%> good. <S%G4851><s%>

For to one <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of wisdom <S%G4678><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and to another <S%G243><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of knowledge <S%G1108><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the same <S%G846><s%> Spirit; <S%G4151><s%>

to another <S%G2087><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> by the same <S%G846><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and to another <S%G243><s%> gifts <S%G5486><s%> of healing <S%G2386><s%> by the one <S%G1520><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%>

and to another <S%G243><s%> the effecting <S%G1755><s%> of miracles, <S%G1411><s%> and to another <S%G243><s%> prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> and to another <S%G243><s%> the distinguishing <S%G1253><s%> of spirits, <S%G4151><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%> [various] kinds <S%G1085><s%> of tongues, <S%G1100><s%> and to another <S%G243><s%> the interpretation <S%G2058><s%> of tongues. <S%G1100><s%>

But one <S%G1520><s%> and the same <S%G846><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> works <S%G1754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> distributing <S%G1244><s%> to each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> individually <S%G2398><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as He wills. <S%G1014><s%>

For even <S%G2509><s%> as the body <S%G4983><s%> is one <S%G1520><s%> and [yet] has <S%G2192><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> members, <S%G3196><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the members <S%G3196><s%> of the body, <S%G4983><s%> though they are many, <S%G4183><s%> are one <S%G1520><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For by one <S%G1520><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> we were all <S%G3956><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> into one <S%G1520><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> Greeks, <S%G1672><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> slaves <S%G1401><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> free, <S%G1658><s%> and we were all <S%G3956><s%> made <S%G4222><s%> to drink <S%G4222><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
For the body <S%G4983><s%> is not one <S%G1520><s%> member, <S%G3196><s%> but many. <S%G4183><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> the foot <S%G4228><s%> should say, <S%G3004><s%> "Because <S%G3754><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not a hand, <S%G5495><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not [a part] of the body, <S%G4983><s%>" it is not for this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G3844><s%> any <S%G3756><s%> the less <S%G3756><s%> [a part] of the body. <S%G4983><s%>

And if <S%G1437><s%> the ear <S%G3775><s%> should say, <S%G3004><s%> "Because <S%G3754><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not an eye, <S%G3788><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not [a part] of the body, <S%G4983><s%>" it is not for this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G3844><s%> any <S%G3756><s%> the less <S%G3756><s%> [a part] of the body. <S%G4983><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> were an eye, <S%G3788><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> would the hearing <S%G189><s%> be? If <S%G1487><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> were hearing, <S%G189><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> would the sense <S%G3750><s%> of smell <S%G3750><s%> be?

But now <S%G3568><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has placed <S%G5087><s%> the members, <S%G3196><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them, in the body, <S%G4983><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as He desired. <S%G2309><s%>
And if <S%G1487><s%> they were all <S%G3956><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> member, <S%G3196><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> would the body <S%G4983><s%> be?
But now <S%G3568><s%> there are many <S%G4183><s%> members, <S%G3196><s%> but one <S%G1520><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

And the eye <S%G3788><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to the hand, <S%G5495><s%> "I have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of you"; or <S%G2228><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> to the feet, <S%G4228><s%> "I have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of you."

On the contrary, <S%G235><s%> it is much <S%G4183><s%> truer <S%G3123><s%> that the members <S%G3196><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%> which seem <S%G1380><s%> to be weaker <S%G772><s%> are necessary; <S%G316><s%>

and those [members] of the body, <S%G4983><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we deem <S%G1380><s%> less <S%G820><s%> honorable, <S%G820><s%> on these <S%G3778><s%> we bestow <S%G4060><s%> more <S%G4053><s%> abundant <S%G4053><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> and our unseemly <S%G809><s%> [members come to] have <S%G2192><s%> more <S%G4053><s%> abundant <S%G4053><s%> seemliness, <S%G2157><s%>

whereas <S%G1161><s%> our seemly <S%G2158><s%> [members] have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> [of it.] But God <S%G2316><s%> has [so] composed <S%G4786><s%> the body, <S%G4983><s%> giving <S%G1325><s%> more <S%G4053><s%> abundant <S%G4053><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> to that [member] which lacked, <S%G5302><s%>

that there should be no <S%G3361><s%> division <S%G4978><s%> in the body, <S%G4983><s%> but [that] the members <S%G3196><s%> should have <S%G3309><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> care <S%G3309><s%> for one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

And if <S%G1535><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> member <S%G3196><s%> suffers, <S%G3958><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the members <S%G3196><s%> suffer <S%G4841><s%> with it; if <S%G1535><s%> [one] member <S%G3196><s%> is honored, <S%G1392><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the members <S%G3196><s%> rejoice <S%G4796><s%> with it.
Now <S%G1161><s%> you are Christ's body, <S%G4983><s%> and individually <S%G3313><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> of it.

And God <S%G2316><s%> has appointed <S%G5087><s%> in the church, <S%G1577><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> apostles, <S%G652><s%> second <S%G1208><s%> prophets, <S%G4396><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> teachers, <S%G1320><s%> then <S%G1899><s%> miracles, <S%G1411><s%> then <S%G1899><s%> gifts <S%G5486><s%> of healings, <S%G2386><s%> helps, <S%G484><s%> administrations, <S%G2941><s%> [various] kinds <S%G1085><s%> of tongues. <S%G1100><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> are not apostles, <S%G652><s%> are they? All <S%G3956><s%> are not prophets, <S%G4396><s%> are they? All <S%G3956><s%> are not teachers, <S%G1320><s%> are they? All <S%G3956><s%> are not [workers of] miracles, <S%G1411><s%> are they?

All <S%G3956><s%> do not have <S%G2192><s%> gifts <S%G5486><s%> of healings, <S%G2386><s%> do they? All <S%G3956><s%> do not speak <S%G2980><s%> with tongues, <S%G1100><s%> do they? All <S%G3956><s%> do not interpret, <S%G1329><s%> do they?

But earnestly <S%G2206><s%> desire <S%G2206><s%> the greater <S%G3173><s%> gifts. <S%G5486><s%> And I show <S%G1166><s%> you a still <S%G2089><s%> more <S%G5236><s%> excellent <S%G5236><s%> way. <S%G3598><s%>
